DOC.brief_summary: This is an open-label, clinical pharmacology study to investigate drug-drug interaction in patients with RA.
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Study of MRA in Patient With Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA)
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria Patients who are diagnosed with RA according to the 1987 American College of Rheumatology (ACR) classification criteria Patients who contracted RA at least 6 months prior Exclusion criteria Patients with Class IV Steinbrocker functional impairment at enrollment. Patients who have been treated for the underlying disease with a biological agent, such as infliximab or etanercept and have been receiving treatment with leflunomide, within 12 weeks before initiation of treatment with the probe drug
